loans.use: to pay for additional ready-to-wear products like shirts for men and women, bags, sandals, shoes and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Carolina Fabiola

texts.es:
Carolina es una mujer de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su pareja y su pequeño hijo, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Carolina no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Carolina trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas recorriendo las calles para vender sus productos, Carolina se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Carolina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara el mejoramiento de los servicios higiénicos de su vivienda, de esta manera ella y su familia tendrán mayor bienestar, así pues Carolina seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda segura y adecuada.
texts.en:
Carolina is a 23-years old woman who lives in the city of Nazca with her partner and her young son. She is hardworking, enthusiastic, and she is putting all her effort in to get ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and because she has to work, Carolina can't pursue a professional career.

On her own initiative, Carolina works selling beauty products. She works every day for about 10 hours walking the streets to sell her products. Carolina is comfortable doing her work and she thinks that it is going well for her as a result of her dedication and effort.

Carolina is very grateful for Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance provided, she will carry out the process to improve the bathroom in her home. This will allow her and her family to have more comfort. Carolina will keep working and striving to achieve her big dream to have safe and adequate housing.

loans.use: to improve the bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Kwekwe

texts.en:
Kwekwe is a hardworking and enterprising woman.  Her greatest monthly expense is household consumables.

For the past one year, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby.  She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation.  She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale.  She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Cau

texts.en:
Cau, 44, lives in Ho Chi Minh City with his family, including two children and his wife. He and his wife have earned money through raising insects to sell. He has been in this business for 10 years. 

He would like to get a loan to increase the scale of his business by buying equipment and materials to build enclosures and improve his breeding facilities. He hopes that this will increase his sales and better satisfy his customers' needs. He also hopes his business will ensure that his family members, and especially his children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy equipment and materials to raise insects.

loans.name: Ha

texts.en:
Ha, 50, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including a daughter and her husband. Ha and her husband earn money through their business producing frames. They have been in this business for five years. 

Ha is sometimes unable to provide the volume of frames required by her customers. Consequently she would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of material to make frames and increase her production to meet her customers' needs. She also hopes her business will ensure that her family members will have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to make and sell frames.

loans.name: Murad

texts.en:
Murad is a 64-year-old married man.  He lives in the small village of Zestaponi district with his wife, son, daughter-in-law and and infant granddaughter. He has been involved in the agricultural business from early childhood, as his parents were farmers and this is a traditional activity for the family. 
Sadly, for lack of economic resources and because he had to start working at a very young age, Murad was unable to study a professional career. 

The family has 2 cows, whose milk is used in cheese products.  Murad works hard on family-owned agricultural land, growing maize.  In addition he owns a vineyard and produce wine.  He always has high quality products, which is sold to local retailers for a good price.   As the family has only seasonal income, Murad decided to start a family business and to seek credit from some local financial institutions, but his attempts were unsuccessful because of his poor income. 

The startup program, that is joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables rural poor and inexperienced people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses.  His application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of 1,000 GEL for purchasing building materials to build a greenhouse.  He has already started building, but needs some materials to cover the greenhouse.  As the greenhouse is built, he will sow vegetables and will have stable income after selling the harvested products.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for the greenhouse

loans.name: Mlongo

texts.en:
Mlongo is married, with two children, who are still young. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food.

For the past one year, she has owned a fruit-selling business, where neighbors and town dwellers are her potential customers. She faces a major challenge of lack of enough capital to expand her business.

With the KES 10,000, she wants to purchase a variety of fruits for sale. She dreams of expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fruits for sale

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida, who is 48 years old, is the responsible mother of six children, living happily in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. This is her first loan with BRAC. She is a new member, and she agreed to the terms and conditions of BRAC.

Her husband owns a scrap shop and deals with scrap iron, aluminum, plastic bottles, etc. He has been running his business for many years. 

Nowadays, due to household expenses, he does not have the money needed to buy scrap goods, and so he does not have scrap to sell for earning money 
Therefore Khalida has requested a loan for her husband so he can buy scrap goods, re-establish his enterprise, and make some savings to meet sudden needs or incidents. 

She is very impressed with this honorable support and expresses her wish to take more loans after the payment of this loan. She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy scrap goods such as iron, aluminum, and plastic bottles for her husband's resale business.

loans.name: Ayubjon

texts.ru: Аюбчон честный человек, который занимается предоставлением услуги мастера по ремонту более 12 лет. Он научился этим мастерством у мастера, который жил не далеко от их дома. Аюбчон постепенно усовершенствовал свои навыки. Данное время он является опытным мастером. Аюбчон вдовец. Его жена умерла. Он воспитывает своих 4 детей один. Аюбчон хочет купить автомашину для своего домохозяйства, так как он нуждается в машине. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки автомашины. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Ayubjon is an honest man who has been offering his services as a renovation contractor for more than 12 years. He learned this trade from a tradesman who lived not far from their home. He has gradually perfected his skills and is now an experienced contractor. He is a widower whose wife died and he is raising his four children alone. Ayubjon wants to buy a vehicle, since he needs a car for his everyday activities. He is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to purchase a vehicle. He awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to purchase a car

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 56-year-old married mother of three children. She has been working in the tailoring business for  forty years. Fatima was employed at a tailoring company until she started her own business in 1982 to improve her living and increase her income. Fatima works from her house, where she can take care of both her children and customers' needs. She also works in preparing and selling Mouneh (traditional Lebanese methods of food preservation)  which is an additional income business.

Fatima is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a car to use to rent as an additional income business. She hopes that in the future she can open her tailoring clothes factory outside her house and establish a car rental company too.

loans.use: to buy a car to use to rent as an additional income business.

loans.name: Arame Diouf

texts.fr:
Madame Arame Diouf, une femme de 34 ans, s’activent dans le commerce depuis deux ans seulement. Son activité consiste à vendre des draps de lit qu’elle a organisé sous forme de tontine dans le quartier où elle loge. Arame Diouf est divorcée et avec ce statut, elle trouve un peu de temps à elle pour s’occuper de ses affaires commerciales.
Elle a déjà eu à bénéficier d’un crédit au sein de l’IMCEC et un renouvellement lui permettra d’acheter des draps de lit et d’honorer une commande.
De son mariage, elle a eu des enfants qui sont à sa charge et c’est à partir des revenus de son activité, qu’elle arrive à les nourrir et à s’occuper convenablement de leur éducation.
Elle veut améliorer son activité jusqu’à devenir indépendante financièrement.
texts.en:
Arame Diouf is a 34-year-old woman, who has worked in retail for just one year now. Her business is selling bed linen, and she works through a savings group in the village where she lives. Arame Diouf is divorced, and because of this she has managed to find a little time for herself so that she can take care of her business. She has already had one loan from UIMCEC, and taking out another will allow her to buy bed linen and fulfill an order.

Her marriage produced two children who are now under her care. With her business income, Arame Diouf manages to feed her children and provide for their education. She would like to improve her business so as to become financially independent.

loans.use: To buy bed linen for resale in her neighborhood

loans.name: Cecilia Roxana

texts.es:
Cecilia es una mujer muy carismática y trabajadora, la cual con mucho esfuerzo inicio su negocio de peluquería desde hace 4 años, Cecilia cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy dedicada, amable con sus clientes y muy cuidadosa con lo que hace.

Cecilia esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales como tijeras, shampoo, acondicionadores, tintes, entre otros; de esta manera tendrá los materiales necesarios para realizar su trabajo y poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener un spa”.
texts.en: Cecilia is a very charismatic and hardworking woman, who started her own hairstyling business 4 years ago with a great deal of effort.  Cecilia believes that her business is doing well because she is very dedicated, is friendly with her clients, and takes great care in her work.  Cecilia is grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have provided she will be able to buy materials such as scissors, shampoo, conditioner, and hair color, among other things.  She will then have the materials she needs to carry out her work, and to make her great dream a reality:  to have a spa.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as shampoo, conditioner, and hair color, among other things.

loans.name: Tierra Blanca  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Tierra Blanca está formado por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por un hermoso sector de Guzho en Cuenca, que pertenece a la parroquia de Turi, esta parroquia es reconocida por ser el mirador de la ciudad ya que desde lo más alto se puede admirar la belleza de la ciudad. Su gente es amable, gentil y sobre todo muy trabajadora que se dedica a la crianza de animales, agricultura y comercio, muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes profesiones, todas estas actividades les permiten mejorar la estabilidad de sus hogares y sacar  adelante a sus familias.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Carmen, desde hace 10 años forma parte del grupo de crédito, le gusta esta forma de crédito por la unión y solidaridad, al mismo tiempo que los créditos le han permitido mejorar su negocio y las charlas de educación les han ayudado en su vida diaria.
La Señora María Carmen tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 8 hijos, cuatro de sus hijos son casados y viven independientes, dos de sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, sus dos últimos hijos están estudiando en el colegio, su esposo trabaja en la área de la construcción ya que este trabajo también lo aprendió de su padre, la casa en la que viven es el fruto del trabajo conyugal.
Doña María Carmen se dedica a la agricultura y  a la crianza de animales, aprendió esta actividad de sus padres y ahora le da la oportunidad de mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar, ella cría cerdos, cuyes y pollos, los tiene de 3 y 6 meses y los vende, le va bien en el negocio. 
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cerdos y en alimento de todos sus animales. Su meta es incrementar la crianza de pollos.
Las dos fotos pequeñas son de una socia y un socio que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The Tierra Blanca (White Earth) credit group consists of 7 female members and 1 man who live by a beautiful area called "Guzho" in Cuenca (Basin), which belongs to the Turi parish. This parish is known for being the lookout in the city since you can admire the beauty of the city from the top. The people are kind, gentle, and especially hardworking. There type of work includes: animal husbandry, agriculture and trade. Several people work in the city having different kinds of professions. All of these activities allow them to improve the stability of their homes and raise their families.

Maria Carmen is the head of the group. She established the credit group 10 years ago.  She likes this form of credit because of the unity and solidarity. At the same time, the loans have improved her business and education talks have helped them in their daily lives. 

Maria Carmen is 37-years-old, married, and in her marriage she has had eight children. Four of her children are married and living independently, two of her sons work and help out financially, and her last two children are going to school. Her husband works in the construction trade which he learned from his father. The house in which they live is the success of them working together in their marriage.

Maria Carmen works at farming and animal husbandry. She learned this activity from her parents and now it gives her the opportunity to improve the stability of her home. She raises pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens. She has them for around 3 to 6 months and then sells them. Her business is doing well for her. 
The money from her loan will invested in buying chickens, pigs, and animal feed. Her goal is to increase raising chickens.

The two small photos are from a female member and a male member who could not be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy chickens, pigs, and animal food.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself to be focused and hardworking. She operates a retail shop where she sells wheat flour, soap, cooking fat and other items. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low demand of products and government policies which affect her business. She will use the KES 16,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use.This will benefit ten family members. She hopes she will have a bright future. This is her fourth loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen, a 62-year-old, hard-working woman, lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She lives with her husband, three sons, and two daughters. One son and both daughters are studying, and her husband is an auto mechanic. His income is insufficient to meet the family's needs, so Nasreen is trying to help him fulfill their needs by stitching clothes. She herself is a tailor, and she wants to generate more income by purchasing a new sewing machine. She will extend her business if she gets a good amount of profit in the future.

Nasreen has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan, to purchase a sewing machine that will enable her to stitch more dresses and to satisfy the needs of her clients more professionally. She hopes to reach her desired net income, with the help of the loan. Then, she hopes, she will be able to save for their future. She dreams of giving her children a quality education.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Gian Carlos

texts.es: Gian Carlos vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerado como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, él se dedica a la agricultura pues cosecha coca, yucas, piñas, plátanos entre otras cosas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar  fertilizantes. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Gian Carlos lives in the city of Patria with his family, and farms to earn a living (Patria is located in Kosñipata District in Paucartambo Province in Cusco, Peru). He grows coca, yucca, pineapples, bananas, and other crops, and has a reputation as a hardworking and trustworthy man. Gian Carlos has operated his farm for several years, and his efforts are paying off as the farm is doing well. 

Gian Carlos belongs to the "Los Girasoles" [Sunflowers] Communal Bank, and needs a loan to purchase fertilizers. He is grateful for the loan and appreciates how it will help his farm, so Gian Carlos is committed to making his monthly payments on time and in full.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Arzikan

texts.ru: Арзыкан 54 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Арзыкан - высшее образование, работает преподавателем в местной школе. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Арзыкан занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Арзыкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 20 овец, а также имеет земельный надел размером 2,25 ГА, на которой выращивает фасоль, картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). Арзыкан входит в группу "Хан-Бурго", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. В итоге их трое. Арзыкан является лидером группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Арзыкан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Арзыкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Arzikan is 54 years old, married and raising three children together with her husband. Arzikan has a higher education and works as a teacher at a local school. To provide additional income for her family, Arzikan is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 15 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Arzikan's hard work, today her business contains 3 dairy cows, 20 sheep and also a 2.25 hectare land plot, where she grows beans and potatoes. The monthly income amounts to 13,000 som (KGS). Arzikan is part of the "Han-Burgo" group that includes two more persons. All together there are three of them in the group.  Arzikan is the leader of the group. In order to further develop her business, Arzikan requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy bulls to increase livestock headcount. Arzikan plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy bulls to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Carlos Julio

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 9 De Julio se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive don Carlos, tiene 50 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y no tienen hijos. Su esposa es artesana.
El señor Carlos es un hombre muy trabajador que para llevar el pan diario a su hogar se dedica al comercio,  vende ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde su esposa le ayuda con sus ventas ya que allí ella tiene un pequeño salón de belleza. Trabaja todos los días ya sea  en las mañanas o en las tardes, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Tiene más de 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual saca adelante a su familia.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva 2 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque le ayudan mucho con los créditos. Sus sueños seguir adelante en su negocio y su vida familiar.
texts.en: The 9 De Julio communal bank meets every two weeks in the canton of Montecristi, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts, which are recognized nationally and internationally: the place of the famous straw hats.  In this place lives Carlos, who is 50 years old and lives in a common-law relationship with no children.  His wife is a craftswoman.  Carlos is very hard-working, and works selling all kinds of clothing to support his household.  He sells door-to-door, and also from his house, where his wife helps him with his sales and also has a small beauty salon.  He works every day, morning and afternoon.  He provides products to his customers on credit and collects every two weeks.  He has been doing this work to support his family for over 20 years.  He will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as: pants, blouses, T-shirts, and children's clothing.  He has been with the communal bank for 2 years, and likes it because it helps him a lot with loans.  His dreams are to carry on with his business and his family life.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Khady's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 13 décembre 2008. Il est constitué de femmes habitant le même village et qui font comme principales activités le commerce et l'embouche. Les femmes entretiennent de très bonnes relations entre elles.
Codou, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants dont 02 filles. Elle fait comme activité principale de l'embouche bovine. Elle va acheter un bœuf dans les marchés hebdomadaires à 175 000 F. Elle achète aussi pour 40 000F d'aliments pour bétail et avec le reste des vaccins. Au bout de six mois, elle le revend entre 275 000 et 285 000 F surtout durant les périodes de fêtes.
Avec les bénéfices, elle va s'occuper du bien-être de sa famille et réinvestir dans ses activités.
texts.en:
This group was created on 13 December 2008. It consists of women who live in the same village and whose main activities are commerce and livestock fattening. They all get along very well. 

Codou, age 51, is the group member standing on the right and raising her hand. She is married with four children, two girls. 

Codou’s main business activity is cattle fattening. She plans to buy one head of cattle at the weekly market for 175,000 F. She will also purchase 40,000F worth of cattle feed and any remainder will be used to get vaccines. After a period of six months, she will sell it for 275,000 to 285,000 F. She expects to get a higher price during the holiday season. 

She will use her profits to look after her family’s well-being and to reinvest in her activity.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle for fattening.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Alyi

texts.ru: Алый 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 6 детей. У Алый - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Алый занимается животноводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Алый, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, 1 теленок, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,75 ГА, на которой выращивает фасоль, картофель и многолетнюю траву. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). Алый входит в группу "Хан-Бурго", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека.  Алый является вторым членом группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Алый обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Алый планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома для младшего сына.
texts.en: Alyi is 61 years old, married and raising six children together with her husband. Alyi has a secondary education. To provide the primary income for her family, Alyi is involved in animal husbandry, having started 30 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 1,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Alyi's hard work, today her business contains 3 dairy cows, 1 horse, 1 calf and also a 1.75 hectare land plot, where she grows beans, potatoes and perennial herbs. The monthly income amounts to 11,000 som (KGS). Alyi is part of the "Han-Burgo" group that includes two more persons. Alyi is the second member of the group. In order to further develop her business, Alyi requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy sheep to increase livestock headcount. Alyi plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to build a new house for her youngest son.

loans.use: to buy sheep to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Diouma Ngor's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe fait partie du Banc villageois qui a été créé le 13 décembre 2008. Il est constitué de femmes habitant le même village et qui font comme principales activités le commerce et l'embouche. Les femmes entretiennent de très bonnes relations entre elles.
Diouma, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 50 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants des garçons. Elle fait comme activité principale de l'embouche bovine. Elle va acheter un bœuf à 180 000 F et le reste sera utilisé pour l'achat de nourriture. Elle va l'élever et au bout de 06 mois le revendre entre 275 000 et 280 000 F et parfois même à 300 000 F.
Avec les bénéfices, elle compte réinvestir dans son activité et renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This group belongs to a Banc Villageois created on 13 December 2008. It consists of women who live in the same village and whose main activities are commerce and livestock fattening. They all get along very well. 

Diouma, age 50, is the group member standing on the right and raising her hand. She is married with two children, both of them boys. 

Diouma's main business activity is cattle fattening. She plans to buy one head of cattle for 180,000 F, and any remainder will be used to buy cattle feed. She will fatten the animal and after a period of six months, she will sell it for 275,000 to 280,000 F, maybe even 300,000 F. 

She will use her profits to reinvest in her activity and to bolster her savings.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle for fattening.

loans.name: Maimuna

texts.en:
Update on Maimuna
Maimuna is a woman of thirty-eight years, married to Mohamed and a mother of eight children. She runs a catering business and has been in this business for thirteen years. She gets a monthly income of 13,750.

This will be Maimuma's third loan with KADET. She plans to use the entire loan to buy food ingredients, like cooking flour and cooking oil. She wants to educate her children in future.

loans.use: to purchase food ingredients for her catering business, like cooking oil and flour.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a  Kiva borrower. He describes himself to be experienced. He operates a M-pesa shop where he offers mobile phone-based money transfer service. He describes his family challenge to be water storage. He will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy  a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. He hopes that in the future, he will be successful. This is his fourth loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loan of KES 60,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is a lady of 44 years, married to Mohamed and a mother of four children. She runs a catering business and also sells clothes. She has been in this business for thirteen years now, and she earns a monthly income of 40,000 shillings (KES).

This will be Rehema's fourth loan with KADET LTD, and she plans to use the entire loan to buy new stock of clothes to sell.  In the future she wants to be a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Fridaus

texts.en:
Fridaus is a married woman with one child who is still underage. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past one year, she has operated a business of selling cloth called 'leso' (women's wraps). She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of expanding to become a big supplier of clothes in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase 40 'Leso' ( women's wraps)  for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase 40 lengths of 'Leso' (women's wraps)  for resale

loans.name: Rinat

texts.en:
Rinat is a 32-year-old mother of one from the Jerusalem area. Originally from the former USSR, Rinat has developed a video editing business. She has several contractors with a steady work flow. In order to meet demands, Rinat has hired staff to assist with editing projects. Unfortunately Rinat’s second computer is inadequate for the editing and, consequently, slow. The lack of vital equipment delays Rinat’s productivity and hinders her income potential.

Rinat needed this loan to purchase a new computer.

Rinat’s business has good potential with high demand in Jerusalem for her services. She wants to become a senior video editor. She is working on her dream project, which encompasses short videos within an interactive map. The project focuses first on Israel and then major sites worldwide.

loans.use: To buy a new computer for video editing.

loans.name: Le

texts.en: Le is a 40-year-old married woman with two children. She lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns a living as a worker. Le has been running a food stall in front of her house for ten years. She sells steamed rice, pancakes, and pork pies. She would like to receive a loan to expand her business by purchasing more rice, cooking appliances, and good quality food. She hopes that this will enable her to increase the turnover of her business, earn a higher income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy more rice, cooking appliances, and good quality food

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is a widowed mother of six children. She owns a house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over two years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and those who pass by. In this business she faces a major challenge of seasonality.

With the 20,000 KES she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat.

loans.name: Mwanabibi

texts.en:
Mwanabibi is a married woman with one child who is still underage. She lives at her own house that has both electricity and piped water.

Mwanabibi has operated a barber shop business for the past two months. Her potential customers are men. 

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase body powder, spirit, shaving skin cream, and shaving brushes for the business . She decided to join Yehu to get financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase body powder, spirit, shaving skin cream, and shaving brushes for the business

loans.name: Aasma

texts.en:
Aasma, a 24-year-old hard-working woman, lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her husband, and one son. Her son is in school, and her husband is a security guard. His income is insufficient to meet the family's needs, so Aasma  is trying to help him fulfill their needs by stitching clothes. She herself is a tailor, and she wants to generate more income by purchasing a new sewing machine. She will extend her business if she gets a good amount of profit in the future. 

For the purchasing of a new sewing machine, Aasma has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan so she can stitch more dresses and satisfy the needs of her clients more professionally. She hopes, with the help of the loan, to reach her desired net income and be able to save for their future. She dreams of giving her child a quality education.

loans.use: To pay for purchasing a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Sitora

texts.en:
Sitora is a student in the fourth course. She studies at the medical college. She is smart and a hardworking girl. 

Sitora always wanted to be a doctor. After graduating school, she entered the medical collage with great pleasure. Now, she studies hard. She goes to the library every day after her classes to learn subjects more deeply. She lives with her parents in the capital of Tajikistan. 

Sitora helps her mother with the household. She is not from a rich family. Her parents have not enough money to pay her tuition. She is asking for a loan to pay for her tuition. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for tuition at the medical college

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es: Florentino vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerado como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, él trabaja en una entidad pública y en sus horas libres se dedica a brindar servicio de transportes en su mototaxi. Ya son varios años que se dedica al brindar servicio de transportes y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del mototaxi. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: Florentino lives in the city of Patria with his family, and he’s regarded as a person who’s hardworking and responsible. He works for a public agency, and in his free time he offers transportation services via his moto-taxi. He’s been doing this for some years, and it’s going well thanks to the effort he puts into his work. He belongs to the communal bank “Los Girasoles” (The Sunflowers), and the loan he needs is for maintenance work on his moto-taxi. He is thankful and values the loan. He promises to comply responsibility with the terms of his monthly payments. (The city of Patria is located in the Kosñipata district, in the Paucartambo province, of Cusco, Peru.)

loans.use: to pay for maintainence work on his moto-taxi.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es:
María José,  madre soltera, con un hijo menor de edad. Es originaria de León, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable con ganas de salir adelante. Sus sueno en la vida es formar a su pequeño hijo y llegar a establecer su negocio como farmacia. Para brindarle un futuro mejor a su hijo.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de medicamentos, genéricos y naturales. Como antigripales, acetaminofén, vitaminas, losartan, gliblencamida, loratadina, talerdin. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diarias, ofreciendo su producto, el objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de medicamentos, para que en un  futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  María agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas Kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
María José is a single mother with a young child. She is originally from León, a place that is located in the western part of the country. María José is known as a hardworking and responsible individual who has the drive to succeed. Her dream is to raise her young son and establish a business of her own, such as a pharmacy. This will enable her to provide a better future for her son. Thanks to her effort and her desire to move forward, she started a business of selling medicines, both generic and natural. Her products include acetaminophen, vitamins, losartan, glibenclamide, loratadine, and talerdin.

María José works at her business about 10 hours a day by offering her products. The purpose of her loan is to invest it as operating capital show that she can restock her business of buying and selling medicines. In the not-so-distant future, she would like to generate more income.

María José appreciates the assistance that Kiva lenders provide to people who have limited resources and are from poor countries, such as Nicaragua, so that they can earn a decent living.

loans.use: to buy a variety of medicines to sell.

loans.name: Chau

texts.en:
Chau is 43 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns income as a worker. Chau runs a business of selling rice and drinking water to earn a living. 

She started her business ten years ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a larger quantity and variety of rice and drinking water to sell to her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity and variety of rice and drinking water to sell to her customers

loans.name: Akram

texts.en:
Akram is a 45-year-old father of 6 children living in the Gaza strip.

He applied for a loan from ACAD to open his own grocery store, so that he can increase the income of his big family and improve their lives.

Akram started this project in the same neighborhood he lives in to provide basic needs.

His future goals are to expand his shop and open a supermarket so he can provide a decent livelihood for his children.

Akram's challenges are the lack of tools and means to expand the project.

loans.use: To open a grocery store

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong, 44, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a veterinarian.

Phuong has been running a general store in front of her house for four years. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more different new products to better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her children to school.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying more different new products to better satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Bich

texts.en:
Bich, 58, is married and has four children: one son and three daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn an income running a business selling incense and religious items and seafood. 

She started this business ten years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of religious items to stock her store and different kinds of seafood to better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying a greater variety of religious items and different kinds of seafood to sell

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en:
Hanh is 35 years old, and is married. She and her husband have been running a general store in front of her door for 10 years. They started this business to cover their family's  expenses and raise their children. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Hanh is requesting a loan to expand her business by offering more foods and many kinds of soft drinks so that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest to her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more foods and many kinds of soft drinks to stock her store

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a 37-year-old married woman. She lives with two children and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. For seven years, she and her husband have run a general store that serves the people in their community.

Thuy would like a loan to purchase better quality food products  and household items. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase better quality food products and household items

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина целеустремленная женщина. Ей 23 года. Она разведенная и не имеет детей. Парвина после того как развелась с мужем, решила поступить в университет, получить высшее образование и сделать хорошую карьеру. Она с такой целью 3 года назад поступила в Таджикский Технологический Университет. Данное время она является студенткой 3 курса по специальности Экономиста. Она учится успешно и получает хорошие и отличные оценки. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Parvina is a goal-oriented woman of 23. She is divorced and has no children. After separating from her husband, Parvina decided to attend university to obtain a higher education and a good career. With this goal in mind, she started attending Tajik Technological University three years ago. She is currently a third-year student with a major in economics. She is an excellent student and receives high marks. She is requesting a loan to pay for her tuition. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition

loans.name: Damaris

texts.en:
Damaris is a woman of 38 years, married to Peter and a mother of three children. She practices mixed farming, keeping pigs, poultry and also dairy farming. She has been in this business for five years and gets a monthly income of five thousand eight hundred shillings.

This will be Damaris's first loan with Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET). She plans to use the entire loan to buy a cow. She wants to expand her business and educate her children in the future.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerado como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, él se dedica a la construcción  de casas y obras pues es considerado como un buen albañil. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la construcción y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo cemento, yeso, pintura y otras cosas más. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Jose lives in the city of Patria together with his family and is considered to be a hard-working and responsible person.  He builds houses and is considered a good bricklayer.  He has been working in construction for several years and it has been going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  

He belongs to the communal bank, "Los Girasoles"  (The Sunflowers) and at this time he needs a loan to buy work materials such as cement, plaster, paint, and other things. He appreciates and is grateful for the loan which he promises to pay back responsibly every month. (The city of Patria is located in the district of Kosñipata, Paucartambo province, Cusco, Peru).

loans.use: to buy work materials such as cement, plaster, paint, etc.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 35 years old and comes from Nyahururu. She is married to Benson who is a businessman and they have three children aged 9, 7 and 4 years old.

Nancy owns a shop where she sells mobile phone accessories and ladies' wear. This business has been in operation for the last one year, and to enable her add more stock to her shop, she has applied for her first loan of Kshs. 20,000 from Kadet Ltd. The stock will comprise of mobile phone accessories and ladies' wear to sell to her customers. 

Her monthly income right now is Kshs. 8,000 and she hopes to use profits realized from her expanded business to start a hair salon.

Nancy hopes to be a successful business lady in the future.

loans.use: To buy more stock of mobile phone accessories and ladies' wear to sell to her customers

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 20 years old and self-employed in the motorcycle transport business. He supports his parents. He learned about KADET from a loan officer, who was carrying out a marketing campaign in Narok town.

John has been in this business for the past one-and-a-half years, earning a monthly income of KES 13,000. He has been advanced his first loan of KES 87,880, which he will use to purchase his own motorcycle. He is likely to earn more, with the flexibility that comes with asset ownership and his already-established customer base.

He will use the proceeds to assist the family to meet their basic needs. He hopes to improve the family's living standard.

loans.use: to purchase his own motorcycle

loans.name: Said

texts.en:
Said, age 41, runs a grocery store business to earn an income. He sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2010. He has built up good experience in this field and is well-known in the surrounding area. He has an excellent reputation. 

Said and his wife have five children. He works hard to provide his family income all by himself. He is requesting a loan in the amount of $2,400, which he will use to buy two new freezers and a new motor generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two new freezers and a new motor generator

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Nga is a 47-year-old married woman. She has two children. Her husband is a worker. Nga lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. For 13 years she has operated a food stall selling meals to people in their community.

Nga would like a loan to purchase new furniture, good quality food, and broken rice in bulk. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture, good quality food to serve, and broken rice in bulk

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en:
Mejumaa is a married woman and has seven children. She lives at her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past three years, she has operated an open-air food business, selling dumplings. Her potential customers are market dwellers and neighbors. She faces a major challenge of seasonality of products in the market.

With the KES 15,000 loan, she wants to purchase cooking oil and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans, to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil and wheat flour

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is married and has two children who attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For over three years, she has been operating a beauty salon business. Her potential customers are neighbours and town dwellers. She dreams of incorporating her business into a beauty training school. 

With the loan that she is requesting she wants to purchase hair extensions, hair treatment, and shampoos. She joined Yehu because of favorable borrowing requirements.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions, hair treatment, and shampoos

loans.name: Dina

texts.en:
Dina is a hard-working woman, who lives in the coastal region of Kenya. She lives at a rented house that has piped water, but not electricity. 

She has operated a beauty salon business for the past two years. Her potential customers are women. She dreams of earning more income and building her own house in the future. 

With the KES 20,000 loan, she wants to purchase chemicals, a hair drier, and hair conditioners for her business. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support, to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals, a hair drier, and hair conditioners for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sugar, soap, salt, Nomi [detergent] and bottled water

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose Antonio vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerado como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, él se dedica a la venta de yuca y hoja de coca, ella distribuye a las revendedoras de los diferentes mercados de la ciudades de Paucartambo, puerto Maldonado y Cusco. Ya son varios años que se al comercio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar hoja de coca y yuca. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Jose Antonio lives in the city of Patria with his family. He is considered a hardworking and responsible person. He makes his living selling coconut and yucca leaves. He distributes to resellers in different markets in the cities of Paucartambo, Puerto Maldonado and Cusco. He has been doing this trade for several years already and it's going very well thanks to the effort that he puts in his work.

He belongs to the "Los Girasoles" [The Sunflowers] village bank. On this occasion he needs the loan to buy coconut and yucca leaves. He is thankful for and values the loan and he is committed to carrying out the payment of his monthly installments with much responsibility. (The city of Patria is located in the district of Kosñipata, in the province of Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).

loans.use: to buy coconut and yuca leaves.

loans.name: Walter Eliseo

texts.es:
Walter Eliseo tiene 47 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el caserío Playa Azul, una zona rural de Pucará, es una comunidad que se caracteriza por un clima caluroso, su población se dedica al comercio de frutales y agricultura de arroz, cacao, maíz a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que se ubica en el departamento de Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Tiene una familia unida que se esfuerza en la labor que realizan, junto a su esposa se dedican a la cría y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior a su domicilio.

Walter ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados y construcción de corrales para distribuir a sus animales y así tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole de esta manera mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Walter Eliseo is 47 years old and lives with his wife in the tiny village of Play Azul, a rural area in Pucará. The area has a hot climate and its people work in the fruit, rice, cacao, and corn industries.  It is two hours from the city of Jaén, which is located in the department of Cajamarca in Peru's northern highlands.

He has a cohesive family that works hard, and together with his wife they raise and sell small animals in an area behind their house.  Walter has asked for a loan of 2,000 Nuevo Soles to buy feed and to build corrals to spread out his animals and in that way improve the product he offers to his customers. This will result in increased income for his family.

loans.use: Compra de alimentos balanceados y construcción de corrales para sus animales .

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Sousan

texts.en: Sousan is an Iraqi client, who is 32-years-old, single, and lives with her family which is composed of five members, of whom three are employed. Sousan assists her brothers in providing the income for their family. Sousan works from her own house and specializes in tailoring women's outfits. She has been in this field since her childhood but chose to take this as her career path in 2008 and opened her own business. She has a lot of experience in this field and has gained an excellent reputation. Sousan is requesting a sum of $1,800 as a loan in order to buy two new sewing machines. She aims to grow her business and increase her profits so she will be able to provide herself and her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy two new sewing machines.

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en: Hanh is 37-years-old and is married with three children, two sons and one daughter. Her husband is a worker for a garment company. Hanh has been running a general store in front of her door for five years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to generate income to raise her children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Hanh is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying many kinds of soft drinks to stock her store. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy many kinds of soft drinks to stock her store.

loans.name: Arkan

texts.en:
Arkan is an Iraqi client who is 31-years-old, married and has a child. Arkan lives with his parents and his brother. He and his brother provide the family income together. Arkan owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He established his business in 2011 and now he has hired an employee. He has built up good experience in this field and is becoming well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation. 

Arkan is requesting a sum of $1,200 as a loan in order to install a rolling shutter and to increase his sales inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter and to increase his sales inventory.

loans.name: Hue

texts.en:
Hue is 35, married, and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Hue operates a business of selling gas, which she has been doing for 12 years. 

Hue is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy a greater quantity and variety of gas tanks to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and generates a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity and variety of gas tanks t

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Felipe vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerado como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, él se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, él tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde cosecha coca, yuca, piña, plátanos, naranja y otras frutas tropicales. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas tropicales, semillas y fertilizantes. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Felipe lives in the city of Patria together with his family and is considered to be a hardworking and responsible person. He makes a living in agriculture and livestock. He has several cultivated terrains where he plants coca, yucca, pineapple, bananas, oranges and other tropical fruits. He has been working in agriculture for several years and it has been going well for him thanks to the determination that he puts into his work. 

He is a member of the communal bank "Los Girasoles" [The Sunflowers] and at this moment requires a loan to buy tropical fruits, seeds and fertilizers. He appreciates and values the loan highly and is committed to fulfilling his monthly quotas with much diligence.

(The city of Patria is located in the district of Kosñipata in the province Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú.)

loans.use: to buy tropical fruits, seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy educational supplies.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: Carmen Rosa vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerada como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, ella se dedica a brindar servicio de videos juegos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a brindar este servicio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las maquinas de video juegos y comprar otras nuevas. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa lives in the city of Patria, together with her family.  She is considered to be a hardworking and responsible person.  She offers video games. She has been doing this for a number of years now and it is going really well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  

She belongs to the Los Girasoles [Sunflowers] communal bank, and this time around she needs a loan to perform maintenance on the video game machines and to buy new ones.  She values the loan and expresses her thanks for it, and she is committed to making her monthly payments responsibly.  (The city of Patria is located in the Kosñipata district of the Paucartambo province in Cusco, Perú.)

loans.use: to perform maintenance on the video game consoles and to buy new ones.

loans.name: Damares Elizabeth

texts.es:
Damares Elizabeth tiene 31 años de edad, vive en casa de su familia, en Pucará una zona donde su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales, café y comercio de todo tipo, a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

Tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa para caballeros, damas y niños es muy conocida en la zona, Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de ropa de temporada para abastecer su tienda en la temporada navideña y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Damares Elizabeth, 31, lives in her family's house in Pucará, two hours from the city of Jaén, in the northern highlands of Peru.  It's an area where people grow fruit trees and coffee and are engaged in all types of commerce.

Damares has a small business selling clothing for men, women, and children, and is very well known in the area.

She has requested a loan for 3,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy seasonal clothing to stock her store for the Christmas season.  This way she'll have more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing for the Christmas season

loans.name: Rosa Del Rosario

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 9 De Julio se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 15, 14 y 6  años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y el menor  en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una recicladora.
Doña Rosa tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, la cual le ha sido de mucha ayuda ya que su esposo no gana mucho en su trabajo y los gastos del hogar son muy grandes, en su tienda  además de víveres también vende frutas, legumbres, bebidas artículos de papelería y de bazar, ella muy de madrugada abre su negocio ya que sus vecinos desde muy temprano le gusta realizar sus compras y es cuando mejores ventas realiza, tiene 4 años con su negocio el cual le gusta porque se gana algo y al mismo tiempo está al tanto de sus hijos.
Este crédito es para surtir aún más su tienda, va a comprar toda clase de víveres. Lleva 3 años en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos ella surte su local. Sus sueños son seguir aumentando su negocio.
texts.en: The 9 De Julio communal bank meets every two weeks in the canton of Montecristi, which is known for its rich, pre-colonial culture and for its crafts, which are recognized nationally and internationally: the place of the famous straw hats.  In this place lives Rosa, who is 43 years old and is married, with three children from this marriage aged 15, 14 and 6.  The two oldest are in high school and the youngest is in primary school.  Her husband works in a recycling plant.  Rosa has a small store in her house that sells food supplies, which has been a great help since her husband does not earn much in his job and they have a lot of household expenses.  In this store she sells fruits, vegetables, drinks and paper and other goods in addition to food supplies.  She opens her business very early in the morning, because that is when her neighbors want to buy things and when her sales are best.  She has had this business for 4 years, and she likes it because she earns income and at the same time can be there for her children.  This loan is to supply her business even more, and she will buy all kinds of food supplies.  She has been with the communal bank for 3 years, and she likes it because she stocks her business with the loans.  Her dream is to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy food supplies.

loans.name: Georjina

texts.es:
Georjina vive junto a sus dos hijos en el distrito de Pucará, su población se dedica al comercio y agricultura a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca.

Ella se dedica a la elaboración de productos de panadería, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio donde posee un horno artesanal es conocida en su zona, ya que dichos productos los ofrece diariamente.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para comprar moldes y carritos para su panadería y una segunda parte para arreglos de su panadería y de esta manera mejorar su producción y al mismo tiempo sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Georjina lives with her two children in the Pucará district, two hours from the city of Jaén in the Cajamarca region.  The residents work in commerce and agriculture.

Georjina earns a living making bakery products.  Her business is located in her home where she has a traditional oven.  She's known in her area because she sells her products daily.

She has requested a loan for 2,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy molds and carts for her bakery.  Part of the money is to fix up her bakery so she can improve her production and her income at the same time.

loans.use: to buy molds and carts

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 24 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Luis no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Luis trabaja como operario en una textil  de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y buen desempeño.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizará el mejoramiento de su vivienda, el comprará madera, palos y esteras para reforzar el techado, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda segura y adecuada.
texts.en:
Luis is a 24-year-old man who lives with his wife in the city of Chincha. He is hardworking and enthusiastic. All of his efforts are focused toward helping his family get ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to work, Luis was not able to study for a professional degree. Through his own initiative, Luis works as an operator at a textile mill in his city. He works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes he is doing well because of his dedication and good performance.

Luis is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be make improvements to his home. He will buy wood, dowels, and woven thatch so that he can reinforce his roof. Luis continues to work and strive toward achieving his greatest wish of having an adequate and secure home.

loans.use: to pay for improvements to his home.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is a married youth client from Iraq. She is 27 years old and has two children. Zainab assists her husband in providing the income of the family. 

Zainab is a tailor and works from home. She has been practicing tailoring since 2012 and specializes in tailoring both children's and women's outfits. She has gained good experience in this field and has gained an excellent reputation. 

Zainab is requesting a youth loan of $1,800 to buy a new sewing machine and to renovate her workplace. She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits, so she may be able to rent a big workplace and expand her business there.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and renovate her workplace

loans.name: Fermin

texts.es:
Fermín tiene 56 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en Oyotun, su población se dedica a la agricultura y comercio, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo que se ubica en la Región norte del Perú.

El tiene junto a su hijo a un negocio de crianza y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior a su domicilio, Fermín ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles con la finalidad de comprar alimentos balanceados y de esta manera tener una mejor producción, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Fermín is 56 years old and lives with his son in Oyotun. Oyotun's community mostly engages in agriculture and commerce, and is two hours from the city of Chiclayo which is located in the northern region of Peru.

He and his son have a business raising and selling small animals in the backyard of his house. Fermin has requested a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles with the purpose of buying animal feed and in this form achieving better production, and generating more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to fatten his livestock

loans.name: Be

texts.en: Be, 44 is divorced, and lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her son. Be has run a coffee and softdrink shop at her door for 15 years. She would like to get a loan to buy a larger quantity and greater variety of soft drinks to meet her customers' needs and to increase her sales . She also hopes her business will ensure that her son will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity and increased variety of sof tdrinks to meet her customers' needs.

loans.name: Shireen's Group

texts.en:
Shireen is a 41-year-old married woman who lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She does not work and instead stays at home to look after her family members because her children are still very young.

Shireen's husband is very hardworking and loves his family a lot. He runs his own business in order to have a regular income for the family; he manufactures and sells furniture, such as single beds, chairs, and tables. He started this business many years ago, has many regular customers and is also taking orders from other cities. This business yields a good income, but his family's needs are increasing day by day and he needs more money to be able to afford their household expenses. 

Shireen wants to buy more raw materials for her husband in order to expand his furniture-making business. This is why she came to BRAC Pakistan to obtain a loan. She hopes that this loan will prove beneficial and productive for her husband's business as well as for the family. She thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan for this honorable support.

Note: Shireen is raising her hand in the picture.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her husband's furniture-making business.

loans.name: Nagina's Group

texts.en: Nagina is a 30-year-old mother of four children. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible daughter, wife and mother. She keeps engaged in her daily routine work; in fact she has to do all tasks alone, and that is why she gets so tired every day. She has to look after her young children, old parents and the needs of her husband.  She wants to purchase a separate house for her family in which she can feel easy and relaxed. But her husband’s job is unsatisfactory for earning a high income.  She wants to help her husband with the growth of the business. Her husband owns a medical store in which he sells medicines. His medical store is situated near a medical clinic. Most of the customers are referred by the doctor of that clinic. Most of the medicines are unavailable due to high cost. Nagina knows that her husband could be able to earn maximum profit if he offered these missing tablets. Therefore she requested a loan for her husband; she hopes that her husband will be able to buy medicine so that he can earn maximum profit.  Nagina hopes that with the profit she will be able to buy a new house soon.

loans.use: A portion of Nagina's Group's $400 loan helps a member to buy medicines for a medical store.

loans.name: Rwakigaju Tukore Group

texts.en: Kate, a married mother of four children, is predominantly an agriculturalist. She does small-scale farming and animal rearing to feed her family and take care of their basic needs, since women meet most of the family's needs in most African homes. She is hard-working and will use the loan to buy baby goats at a cheap price that she will graze for a few months and then sell during the festive season. She thanks the group members for being supportive and Kiva lenders for their interest in them. She urges other group members to be innovative and resilient.The third person from the right is the Ugafode official.

loans.use: To buy baby goats

loans.name: Patman

texts.en:
Patman, age 65, is from the Baghdati district, West Georgia. She is married and lives with her husband. The source of income for the couple is their retirement pensions, which are modest and hardly enough for daily expenses. 

 Patman sorrows that she is not able to generate income in the family, and that is why she decided to start her own business and go to the capital city's market fair to purchase apparel and linens for resale. She will sell the items from her house among her community members. The increased profit will be reinvested in the same business, and Patman will be able to continue the business. Patman believes in your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase stock of clothing and linens for resale

loans.name: Sopheak

texts.en:
Sopheak is 29 years old, married, and has four children. She earns a living through cultivating the land in Cheung Prey district, Kampong Cham province. She has been in farming activities since she was a young girl, living with her parents. She is able to earn a net profit of KHR 6,700 per day, which she usually uses for daily meals. 

Her ambition is to enlarge her farm area and make her business a viable source of income of her family. To help her achieve this dream, she needs a loan in the sum of KHR 1,500,000 to buy a piece of land for rice cultivation. She is hoping to have better crop yields, which she sells in the market each harvest season. She will save the income she earns for enrolling her children in school and for future emergencies of her family.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land for rice cultivation.

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en:
Isaac is a 22-year-old industrious man employed in the motorcycle transport business.  He supports his three siblings. He learned about KADET from a loan officer who was carrying out a marketing campaign in the town of Narok.

Isaac has been in this business for the last two years with a monthly income of 10,000 KES. He has been advanced his first loan of 87,880 KES, which he will use to purchase his own motorcycle. He is likely to earn more with the flexibility that comes with asset ownership and the already established huge customer base in the outskirts of the town with a poor road network.

He will use the proceeds to assist the family with meeting basic needs. He hopes to improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase his own motorcycle.

loans.name: Sonia Ibeth

texts.es: Sonia vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerada como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, ella se dedica a la venta de jugos y refrescos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la venta de jugos y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo frutas y azúcar. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Sonia lives in the city of Patria with her family. She is considered a hardworking and responsible person. She makes her living selling juices and sodas. She has been selling juices for many years now and it's going very well thanks to the effort that she puts forth in her work. She belongs to the "Los Girasoles" [The Sunflowers] village bank.

On this occasion, she needs the loan to buy supplies like fruits and sugar. She is thankful for and values the loan and she is committed to carrying out the payment of her monthly installments with much responsibility. (The city of Patria is located in the district of Kosñipata, in the province of Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).

loans.use: to buy supplies like fruits and sugar.

loans.name: Kenia Patricia

texts.es:
La joven Kenia es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a su familia. Su negocio es la venta de tamales, desde hace un 5 años.
Kenia tiene su negocio ubicado en su casa de habitación en el municipio donde vive. Necesita el préstamo para la compra de hojas, carnes, harina, especias, cubitos, sal, etc.  para seguir elaborando los tamales y poder satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes en estas épocas navideñas este es uno los alimentos que más se vende.
Kenia espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten y que esta inversión le sirva de mucho ya que no cuenta con los productos necesarios para cubrir los pedidos solicitados y a su vez espera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia con el aumento de los ingresos en el hogar.
Kenia su sueño en un corto plazo hacer crecer su negocio y  con esto poder seguir apoyando a su familia 


Choluteca, Honduras – Octubre del  2013
texts.en:
Kenia is a hardworking and responsible young woman who lives with her family in a community in southern Honduras. She has been in the business of selling tamales for five years.

Kenia’s business is located in her house in the town where she lives. She needs this loan in order to buy leaves, meat, flour, spices, bouillon cubes, salt, and other supplies so that she can continue preparing tamales. As a result, she will be able to satisfy the demand from her customers. During the Christmas season, tamales are one of the foods that sells the most.

Kenia expects that her business sales will increase. This investment will be very helpful since she does not have the necessary supplies to cover the orders that she has received. As a result, she hopes to improve her family’s quality of life by increasing her household income. Kenia’s short-term goal is to grow her business so that she can continue supporting her family.

Choluteca, Honduras - October 2013

loans.use: to buy leaves, meat, flour, spices, bouillon cubes, salt, and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Marisol  vive en la ciudad de Patria junto con su familia y es considerada como una persona   trabajadora y responsable, ella se dedica a la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde cosecha plátanos, yuca, hojas  de coca y frutos tropicales. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Girasoles” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Patria está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Marisol lives in the city of Patria together with her family and is considered a hardworking and responsible person. She works in agriculture. She has several cultivated terrains where she plants bananas, yucca, coca leaves and tropical fruits. She has been working in agriculture for several years already and it is going very well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her work.
